post.body: What a great reminder! I am passing this along to a friend, who may need to hear this- thanks for sharing.
thanks for passing this along- I am sending this to my mom, as she does not quite "get" how to do Facebook just yet, but wants to.
maybe getting up early was a gift, so you could have more time to pray, think, and prepare....
I would be willing to review your leggings!
His blessings are abundant!
Struggles with focusing on homework, and many emotional outbursts (lots of crying), and now becoming phyically aggresive.
Thanks for looking up those stats- I am a little surprised that only 5% of kids with ADHD have Tourettes.
my son was diagnosed about 4 or 5 years ago, with Tourettes. He is exhibiting some behavior that made me think of ADHD.
I was just wondering if you happen to know if there is any relationship between ADHD and Tourettes?
The grandparents need our prayers- I cannot imagine how they must feel about the loss of their granddaughter, and their daughter.
That is so sad to hear, however at least they now know and can seek peace- God rest her sweet little soul!
getting my desk organized 2day-not really looking 4ward 2 doing it, however I know I will feel so organized & more productive when finished!
kids hear Santa on his firetruck in the neighborhood- they are anxiously awaiting his visit, and candy canes!
VIDEO RELEASE: Planned Parenthood Covers Up Rape A SECOND Time In Indiana- Mona Lisa Video #2: Coming Monday... http://liveactionfilms.org
Would Jesus have used Twitter? Interesting perspective- http://tinyurl.com/5kqjds
Thank you, and welcome to all my new Twitter and Facebook friends! I am looking forward to getting to know each of you better!

awoke to wet pillow & hair- roof is leaking-yikes!! Thinking of those who are without-just grateful to have a roof, even though it is leaky.

Out of food, Zimbabweans eating cow dung http://tinyurl.com/55z3vh this is poverty at its most dehumanizing!
my oldest had his 12th bday today, & he had the stomach flu- it still was a nice day, I even got to spend some special time w/him & hubby.

the Green Bible looks like an interesting version of the Bible to read- http://is.gd/acKR -it is on my "want to read" list!
I just joined the holistichealth Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/holistichealth and you can too. Please Retweet.

how peaceful it is in the silence, while gazing at the Christmas tree, and praying for my family.
Pro-abortion groups have ‘long list’ of desired U.S. abortion policy changes- http://tinyurl.com/a9g4oy
I just joined the pro-life Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/pro-life and you can too. Please Retweet.
I am up too late, however productive- cleaned the kitchen, sorting through clothes, eating goodies- gotta get caught up on laundry tomorrow!
enjoying a cup of hot chocolate with my kids- yum!
just spoke to my sister, whom I have not spoken to in about 10+ months- it was good to reconnect again!! Love ya, Juli!!
#catholic Besides the Full of Grace study, are there any other bible studies for women and/or moms?
